summary: Nursing student who recently obtained CNA license, with prior GNA experience in the UK. Passionate about patient care, multi-tasking, and learning. Eager to contribute to a medical team with a strong work ethic and willingness to learn.

experience.title: Chef
experience.description: Trained in catheter change and preparation; calm and level-headed under duress; quick problem solver; valid state driver's license; reliable transportation; medical terminology knowledge; extensive knowledge of the food industry as well as the natural foods industry; degree in Culinary Arts and experience as a chef in a fine dining establishment.

experience.title: CNA/GNA
experience.description: Observed and documented patient status; read and recorded temperature, pulse and respiration; massaged patients and applied preparations; completed and submitted clinical documentation; prepared patient rooms; collected urine and fecal samples; supported diagnostic and technical treatment procedures; assisted with nutrition and fluids; directed patients in ROM exercises; provided transportation and companionship; cleaned living quarters; positioned residents for comfort; assisted with transfers; stocked supplies; provided personal nursing care pre- and post-operative; performed routine tests; tended to patients with chronic illnesses; assisted with catheter insertions; charted daily information; reported abnormalities; assisted with ADLs; provided emotional support; communicated with families; promoted continuity of care and safety.

experience.title: Office Manager
experience.description: Point of contact for all contacts; sales for a commercial grounds maintenance company; managed all office operations. Responsibilities included assisting residents with mobility and daily living activities, administering basic nursing and post-operative care; assisting with bathing, oral hygiene, grooming, feeding and elimination; helping patients move in and out of beds, baths, wheelchairs and vehicles; preparing meals; scheduling medical appointments; following lifting instructions; maintaining sanitary conditions; transporting patients; assisting with enemas, catheterization and bladder irrigations; ambulation and crutch walking; documenting resident records; charting vital signs and outputs; providing emotional support; promoting safety and continuity of care; demonstrated compassion and responsiveness to geriatric patients.

experience.title: Private Chef
experience.description: Private chef role providing culinary services; developed and prepared meals and snacks; contributed to client satisfaction in private dining settings.
